message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I believe this is a good deal for both of us.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation affects you more than me.
Bob, the inflation is starting to hurt. I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  This offer is fair.
Inflation is indeed taking its toll on your share, but I'm not immune to the pressure of getting a good deal. Meet me in the middle... closer to my side.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Take it or leave it.
You're right, time is of the essence, but 50/50 doesn't account for the inflation disparity. I'll take a bit more, considering your share's value is dropping.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you more than half! Accept this deal before inflation eats away at my share even more!

I understand your frustration, but I'm not budging much. Your share's value is dropping fast, and I'm not feeling the same pressure. This might be your last chance to walk away with something worthwhile.
